title: [Gameplay] No More Pulsefire Ezreal skin access???
body:
So... I get on, and I notice I'm no longer able to USE Pulsefire {{champion:81}} . Friends have recordings of me USING Pulsefire {{champion:81}} !  So... what gives?

Even look at my matches as {{champion:81}} , most of the time, I'm playing PULSEFIRE {{champion:81}} 
AND PROOF!!! I was gifted it.
https://gyazo.com/1ec793f09844e556d0647e019cc0fc58
Players to Ask: 
Way Too Old
BCpunk1
darkblooddrake
CobraVarsityFB77
SylverSurrexit
(and Various Others)

replies.body:
Sometimes this is caused by a chargeback issue, the person who gifted it to you cancelled the payment after the fact and all content purchased with that rp was thus removed. 

If that isn't the case, contact riot support and have them look at your account.

Yup, this is the most common occurrence of content going missing. 

[Here's](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=4584) the link for Player Support if you don't believe this issue is due to a chargeback.
So, I can't get it back since they already paid you guys and for the skin?
